description: Add support for using AWS Data Pipeline templates to create pipelines and bind values to parameters in the pipeline
Add support for encryption of files in Amazon S3
Fix issue where requests were not being resigned correctly when using Signature Version 4 (`botocore issue 388 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/388>`__)
Fix issue where KMS encrypted objects could not be downloaded (`issue 1026 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1026>`__)
